name: Bat Enchanter Witch
description: Every year in the realm of witches there is a test for them to complete your studies and can use your powers wisely, however the test was very evil and one of the witches refused to do it. Nobody was against the Queen, everyone was afraid of her, since she was the the most powerful witch in the kingdom, the Queen then went to Witch and the forced her to take the test again, but she is kind, kind and animal lover, she would never want to harm anyone, and being the Queen ordered her as a form of punishment that she never left of the castle. To get out she would need the help of her bats, she I wanted to show the others that they didn't have to do everything the Queen ordered that they had the right to choose to do good also.
